headline: Jim Cramer Says “Don’t Speculate, Invest GE Vernova”
summary: GE Vernova Inc. (NYSE:GEV) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer shed light on. A caller asked what Cramer thinks of the stock long term, and he replied: “Alright, GE Vernova, my Charitable Trust owns it… Let me make this really straight. This whole uranium thing, the whole nuke thing, you know, if it happens, […]

headline: GE Vernova (GEV): Assessing Valuation After an 86% Yearly Rally and Rapid Earnings Growth Expectations
summary: GE Vernova (GEV) has quietly become one of the market’s stronger energy-transition stories, with the stock up 86% this year and roughly 83% over the past year. That kind of steady rerating deserves a closer look. See our latest analysis for GE Vernova. At around $631.32 per share, GE Vernova’s recent 1 month share price return of 12.8% and robust year to date share price return suggest momentum is still building as investors grow more comfortable with its earnings trajectory and capital...
